ABOUT_CONTENT:
Welcome to my website! My name is Glenn Visser and I live in Maassluis, Netherlands. I am a fourth year computer science student at the Rotterdam University of Applied Sciences, who loves a challenge. During this study I was able to gain experience with the following languages and frameworks: Python, C#, HTML, CSS, .NET & SQL. I also did an Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) Minor.

In addition to my studies, I work part-time as a software engineer at the company MoreApp. MoreApp and I crossed paths in 2021 when I was looking for a place to do my internship, and after that I sort of stuck around. MoreApp helps companies stop using paper forms by providing a digital alternative that is safe and environmentally friendly. As a Software Engineer I mostly work on the frontend side of our application with languages and tools such as TypeScript, React & TailwindCSS. Currently I am trying to expand my developer toolkit by working on backend issues in Java.

In my spare time I play video games, experiment with programming, watch movies and shows, listen to a lot of music, go to concerts and like to walk. Chances are I'm listening to music right now.
COMPUTER_SCIENCE_DESCRIPTION: During this study I mainly worked with Python, C# and SQL. I also followed two minors: Artificial Intelligence and Data Science.
DEVELOPMENT_INTERN_DESCRIPTION: During my internship at MoreApp I was able to gain a lot of knowledge with TypeScript, TailwindCSS, React and SCRUM. I've also done a lot of Unit and E2E tests.
MOREAPP_PART-TIME_DESCRIPTION: As a part-time software engineer I mainly work on the frontend. Think of working with TypeScript, React & TailwindCSS. I've also experimented a bit with Java on backend issues.
VWO_DESCRIPTION: At secondary school I followed the Nature/Health profile. This includes subjects such as Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics A.
SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: With these settings you can change the language or switch to a different theme (light/dark).
